name: Particle Fatigue
description:
A fractured and vast distorted field of thresholds.
An effigy of Structure wanders with uncertain purpose.
As fragile as a spider's web, yet infinitely tenacious.

6 seeds plant a new tree of life.

A dizzying forest; hazy memories. Overwhelming uncertainty spirals into the open space.
A mournful swamp; ruminations. Deep eyes cast a hostile stare, halting momentum.
A decaying desert; empty heart. Ennui erodes away will, repelling initiative.
A hostile tower; biting words. All comfort stolen away through expecting motion.
A caustic ocean; complex regrets. Sinking and deeper, a jagged suffocation.
A looming edifice; hopeless contrition. Blindly, all light and truth is snuffed.

Perhaps there is another method.

The world is frustrating. Vicious. Unyielding.
Hesitation will allow the noise to increase only further.
Go at your own pace. Know when to advance. Know when to retreat.
Weaving between antimatter, thread the needle.
Sometimes hope needs to be furiously wrenched from a cruel world's grip with gritted teeth.



-this game uses very limited text and uses a limited palette of only 4 colors, this may cause accessibility issues for some people-
